schema.description: This view joins data from the KNA1 and ADRC tables to provide a comprehensive customer profile, including customer master data and address information.  It represents customer data at the individual customer level.

description.value: Postal Code (from KNA1.PSTLZ if available, otherwise from ADRC.POST_CODE1)
Customer Region (from KNA1.REGIO if available, otherwise from ADRC.REGION)
Check Digit for the International Location Number
Account Number of Vendor or Creditor
Central Delivery Block for the Customer
Central Deletion Flag for Master Record
Id for Default Sold To Party
Year for Which Sales Are Given
Year for Which the Number of Employees Is Given
Report Key for Data Medium Exchange
Instruction Key for Data Medium Exchange
Status of Data Transfer into Subsequent Release
Customer Group for Substituicao Tributaria Calculation
Date on Which the Changes Were Confirmed
Central Deletion Block for Master Record
District Code for City and Street File
City PO Box Code City File
Transportation Zone to or from which the goods are delivered
Address Group Key Business Address Services
Flag There Are More Address Group Assignments
Flag indicating if this is a personal address
First telephone number, including dialing code
County name in upper case for search help
Township name in upper case for search help
